definition: abbr. for 中遠集團|中远集团[Zhong1 yuan3 Ji2 tuan2], COSCO (China Ocean Shipping Company)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
COSCO Pacific Limited, major freight company
COSCO Pacific Limited, major freight company
pinyin: zhong1 yuan3 Tai4 ping2 yang2 you3 xian4 gong1 si1
Zhong1 yuan3 Xiang1 Gang3 Ji2 tuan2

sentences.english: As far as she could judge, Mr. Crawford was considerably the best actor of all.
sentences.chinese: 就她看來，克勞福特先生在所有演員當中遠居第一。

sentences.english: COSCO is today perceived as a model company in China as well as in the world shipping community.
sentences.chinese: 中遠在中國和世界航運界已被公認爲是公司的典範。

sentences.english: Prepacked aggregate concrete which is a new technique has been used in the bed plate of Zhongyuan 60000 dwt Dock.
sentences.chinese: 中遠船塢底板採用預填骨料升漿砼新工藝。

sentences.english: First, the report reflects COSCO Group's strategic ideas and development results.
sentences.chinese: 第一，全面反映了中遠集團的戰略理念和發展成效。

sentences.english: Third, the report develops COSCO Group's environmental-protection concepts and resource-saving consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 第三，全面發展中遠集團環保理念和節約意識。

sentences.english: Cosco Airfreight Forwarding Co. , Ltd. has a worldwide agent network.
sentences.chinese: 中遠空運代理有限公司有一個全球性的代理網絡。

sentences.english: Thanks Mr. Xue Baolin for giving us a speech.
sentences.chinese: 感謝中遠集團船員代表薛寶林的講話。

sentences.english: Fifth, the report reflects COSCO Group's social concepts and sense of responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 第五，全面反映了中遠集團的社會理念和責任意識。

sentences.english: COSCO Group attaches great importance to social responsibility and environment protection in its daily operation.
sentences.chinese: 中遠集團在日常運營中高度關注社會責任和環境保護。

sentences.english: Analyzed end stress field of far district slight crackle under blasting dynamic.
sentences.chinese: 分析了爆破弱應力波作用下中遠區裂紋的端部應力場。

sentences.english: "Carrier" means COSCO container lines company limited.
sentences.chinese: 是指“中遠集運”，即中遠集裝箱運輸有限公司。

sentences.english: "Carrier" means COSCO container lines company limited.
sentences.chinese: 是指“中遠集運”，即中遠集裝箱運輸有限公司。

sentences.english: This paper puts forward a model of credit management in COSCON.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出瞭如何在中遠集運實行信用管理的模式。

sentences.english: Fourth, the report reflects COSCO Group's innovation ideas and expansion spirits.
sentences.chinese: 第四，全面反映了中遠集團創新的理念，有開拓精神。

definition: to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
